actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend titles XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to allow States to provide health benefits coverage for parents of children eligible for child health assistance under the State children's health insurance program.
short_title: Family Health Insurance Program Act of 2001
subjects: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Family Health Insurance Program Act of 2001 - Amends title XXI (State Children's Health Insurance Program) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to give States the option to provide for coverage of parent health assistance for targeted low-income parents under SCHIP.

titles.title: Family Health Insurance Program Act of 2001

A bill to amend titles XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to allow States to provide health benefits coverage for parents of children eligible for child health assistance under the State children's health insurance program.
